item.title: Interested in starting a blog? Start with a Google doc first!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: When I started my new job, a few months in I decided to start blogging. At first it really was just for my own personal use, a way for me to keep track of my accomplishments and new things Iâ€™d learned. I didn’t want to get too bogged down and distracted with the trouble of actually creating a blog and designing it – so instead I created a simple Google document and logged stuff daily and/or weekly.
